Uses of Package
nl.inl.blacklab.search

  • Packages that use nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.config  
    nl.inl.blacklab.contentstore
    Deals with storing the original content in UTF-16 for quickly making concordances.
    nl.inl.blacklab.forwardindex
    Manages the forward index, used for fast sorting and grouping.
    nl.inl.blacklab.index
    Classes related to indexing.
    nl.inl.blacklab.mocks  
    nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql  
    nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.fimatch  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene
    Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.matchfilter  
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.results
    Classes for dealing with results, either per-hit or per-document or grouped
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.textpattern  
    nl.inl.blacklab.searches  
    nl.inl.blacklab.tools
    Package for tool applications.
    nl.inl.util
    Miscellaneous utility functions.

  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.mocks 
    Class and Description
    BlackLabEngine
    Main BlackLab instance, from which indexes can be opened.
    BlackLabIndex 
    ContentAccessor
    Defines a way to access the original indexed content.
    Doc
    Combination of a document in the everse index, forward index and content store.
    DocTask
    A task to perform on a document.
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    QueryExplanation
    Object used to explain how a SpanQuery is rewritten.
    Span
    A start and end position (no document id).
    TermFrequencyList
    A collection of tokens and their (absolute) frequencies.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.queryParser.contextql 
    Class and Description
    BlackLabIndex 
    CompleteQuery
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query).
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty

    Doc
    Combination of a document in the everse index, forward index and content store.
  • Classes in nl.inl.blacklab.search used by nl.inl.blacklab.search 
    Class and Description
    BlackLabEngine
    Main BlackLab instance, from which indexes can be opened.
    BlackLabIndex 
    BlackLabIndexWriter 
    CompleteQuery
    Represents a combination of a contents query (a TextPattern) and a metadata "filter query" (a regular Lucene Query).
    Concordance
    A concordance (left context, hit text, right context).
    ConcordanceType
    Types of concordances
    ContentAccessor
    Defines a way to access the original indexed content.
    Doc
    Combination of a document in the everse index, forward index and content store.
    DocContents
    (Part of) the contents of a document.
    DocContentsFromForwardIndex
    (Part of) the contents of a document, in separate annotations read from the forward indices.
    DocTask
    A task to perform on a document.
    QueryExecutionContext
    Represents the current "execution context" for executing a TextPattern query.
    QueryExplanation
    Object used to explain how a SpanQuery is rewritten.
    TermFrequency
    One token and its frequency in some context.
    TermFrequencyList
    A collection of tokens and their (absolute) frequencies.
